properties.title: Swedish Police Seize Record Amount of Cocaine
properties.summary: Swedish police seized three tonnes of cocaine from a shipping container at the Port of Helsingborg, making it the country's largest seizure of the illegal drug.
properties.event_text: Law and crime: War on drugs Swedish police seize three tonnes of cocaine found in a shipping container from South America at the Port of Helsingborg , making it the country 's single-largest seizure of the illegal drug . (Reuters) Spanish police , in coordination with the UK National Crime Agency and the US DEA , seize 10 tonnes of cocaine hidden among a cargo of salt on a cargo ship off the Canary Islands .
